headline: Allegiant Travel to Buy Sun Country Airlines for About $1.1 Billion
summary: Allegiant Travel  reached a roughly $1.1 billion deal to buy  Sun Country Airlines  as budget-focused U.S. airlines struggle with stiff competition from larger rivals.  Larger carriers such as  United Airlines  and  Delta Air Lines  have deployed their own bare-bones fares to lure bargain hunters while catering to faster-growing demand from well-heeled travelers willing to pay up for extras.  Allegiant and Sun Country have been able to steer clear of some of the difficulties that have plagued the low-cost end of the airline industry by being more selective about where and when they fly.

headline: Allegiant to buy rival budget airline Sun Country in $1.5 billion cash and stock deal
summary: Budget airlines in the U.S. like Allegiant and Sun Country have faced a surge in costs following the pandemic and the increase in domestic capacity.
